SectionHeader.h4: AI that understands time series behavior
SectionHeader.body2: We work with time series data that changes over time.

button.title: Data Preparation
button.description: Before forecasting, our algorithms clean and prepare the data

block.title: Smart Data Processing
description: Automatically clean, fill in missing values, and normalize the data
Detect noise and anomalies
Prepare data for training
So that the AI performs reliably ‚Äî even on messy or incomplete data
No manual preparation ‚Äî everything happens automatically

button.title: AI Forecasting
button.description: Our AI doesn't just look at the past ‚Äî it helps you see into the future.

block.title: Adaptive AI Forecasting
description: By analyzing historical data, we generate accurate forecasts that help businesses make informed decisions in advance.
This allows you to:
Plan production and inventory to avoid shortages or overstock
Optimize marketing campaigns based on predicted demand
Reduce financial risks by anticipating market changes
Improve customer service by predicting needs
Forecasting helps make your business more agile and resilient.

button.title: Optimization & Risk Management
button.description: Reduce the impact of unstable factors ‚Äî from market fluctuations to supply chain disruptions.

block.title: Automated Savings
description: AI alerts you in advance and helps adapt to changes.
Cut costs, improve inventory and production management.
By forecasting demand, load, and stock levels, AI helps you spend less and operate more efficiently.

SectionHeader.body2: Smart algorithms, flexible infrastructure, and an AI agent that makes analytics accessible to everyone.

Content.title: AI Agent for Analytics & Decisions
description: Your personal data analyst ‚Äî always on call.
The AI Agent helps you understand your data in real time.
It handles both numbers and requests like: ‚ÄúForecast next week,‚Äù or ‚ÄúShow me the trends.‚Äù
Analytics without an analyst. Confident decisions

Content.title: API Interface
description: A clear and well-documented API makes integration simple ‚Äî whether you‚Äôre connecting BI tools, CRM systems, or custom platforms.
Comes with full documentation, examples, and responsive support.

Content.title: Dashboard
description: A user-friendly dashboard designed for fast forecasting ‚Äî even without technical skills.
Upload a CSV or connect live data‚Äîget AI-powered predictions without a data science degree.
Why it matters:
View forecasts, trends, and anomalies in one place, updated automatically every 30 minutes.
All analytics in one view. Data updates automatically.
Our turnkey tool delivers real-time and historical forecasts through a no-code interface.
Perfect for energy managers, ops teams, or execs who need answers‚Äînot algorithms.

Content.title: Anomaly Detection & Alerts
description: Stay in control of fluctuations and unexpected spikes
The system spots abnormal behavior and notifies you:
Sharp increase in churn, 32 percent above norm ‚Äî you get an alert.
Alerts are fully configurable to fit your goals and thresholds.

Footer.header: From Energy Grids to Stock Markets‚ÄîAI That Forecasts It All
Footer.description: Whether optimizing megawatt loads or predicting demand surges, we deliver

SectionHeader.body2: Clear insights on how our forecasting solutions work‚Äîand how they'll work for you.

Content.question: Will this work with our current data systems?
answer: Our solution integrates via APIs, CSV uploads, or custom connectors‚Äîno need to overhaul your existing infrastructure.
Whether you use legacy monitors or modern cloud platforms, we plug in seamlessly.

Content.question: Do we need AI experts to use this?
answer: Upload your data, and our self-tuning models handle the rest.
For advanced users, we offer customization‚Äîbut 90% of clients run forecasts with just a click.

Content.question: How accurate are your forecasts?
answer: Our hybrid AI (LSTM + XGBoost + Transformer) achieves 95%+ accuracy on energy loads, proven in projects like the University of Brescia. SKNN/H-DIRT algorithms ensure clean data, minimizing errors.

Content.question: Can it scale from a single facility to a city-wide grid?
answer: The same architecture that optimizes office buildings also powers smart cities.
Models auto-adapt to data volume and complexity‚Äîno re-engineering needed.

Content.question: How fast can we deploy this?
answer: 48 hours for API integration, 2-4 weeks for full-stack rollout.
Real-time forecasts start updating within 5 minutes of connection.

Content.question: What about data security?
answer: Your data stays encrypted, and we never share it.
On-premise deployment is available for air-gapped systems.

SectionHeader.body2: AI-Powered Energy Forecasting at University of Brescia, Italy

Content: Hybrid LSTM model cuts prediction errors by 43%‚Äîsaving costs while boosting accuracy to R¬≤ 0.84
A historic Italian campus faced volatile energy bills and inefficient load management due to outdated forecasting methods.
We deployed a self-learning AI system combining:
‚Äì forecasts update every 5 minutes via API
now adapting to other EU campuses

SectionHeader.body2: We integrate into your current systems or deploy from scratch ‚Äî all within days.

Content.title: Risk Management & Decision Making
description: Forecasts remain reliable even with unstable data.

Content.title: AI Agent for Real-Time Decisions
description: Built-in assistant:
more: Answers questions (‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the forecast for next week?‚Äù)
Dashboards, alerts, and recommendations ‚Äî always at hand.

Content.title: Effortless Integration
description: Works with any source: CSV, APIs, databases, BI systems.
more: Compatible with CSV, APIs, and all major data platforms, our solution fits your tech stack like a glove.
We handle collection, storage, and visualization‚Äîzero coding required
Just plug in and get started.

Content.title: Self-Learning AI
description: Upload a spreadsheet ‚Äî the AI adapts to your data.
more: No need to hire analysts: the algorithm detects trends and patterns on its own.
No code, no complexity‚Äîjust hit 'upload' and watch it learn.

Content.title: Cost Optimization
description: AI identifies inefficiencies and demand peaks, reducing costs in logistics, procurement, and inventory.
more: Thanks to predictive planning, we help cut expenses and optimize operations.
Predict what you‚Äôll need ‚Äî before you need it.

Content.title: Interface Anyone Can Use
description: Everything is clear from the first click. Reports and insights in just a few taps ‚Äî even if you‚Äôve only used Excel before.
more: If you can use Netflix, you can use this.
Intuitive charts, one-click reports, and familiar interface patterns get your team up to speed in minutes ‚Äî not weeks.

SectionHeader.body2: Reduce energy waste by 30%+ with automated demand smoothing and smart procurement.

Content.title: Simple Forecast
description: Instant insights, zero hassle
Upload your data, pick a timeframe, and let our science-backed models auto-generate forecasts.
Perfect for quick trendspotting or preliminary analysis when speed trumps ultra-precision.

Content.title: Data Dive
description: See what your data's hiding
Unmask seasonal patterns, volatility hotspots, and predictability limits with granular time-series analytics.
For teams who need more than surface-level trends ‚Äì understand the why behind the numbers.

Content.title: Train Your AI
description: Custom accuracy, no code needed
Tweak parameters, test scenarios, and fine-tune models to your unique data‚Äîall through intuitive sliders, not Python.
Get forecasts that adapt to your business quirks, not the other way around.

Content.title: Always-On Insights
description: Forecasts that chase you
Get SMS/email alerts when predictions hit your custom thresholds.
Spot anomalies early, dodge risks faster, and keep teams synced‚Äîno dashboard refreshing required.

Content.title: Smart Alerts Builder
description: Your rules, your reactions
Define triggers like "Notify if forecasted demand exceeds X" and automate responses.
Syncs with Slack, Teams, or your internal tools to turn predictions into actions.

Content.title: Threshold Guardian
description: Safety nets for your forecasts
When predictions breach critical levels (e.g., energy overloads), get instant warnings.
Pre-set escalation rules ensure the right people act‚Äîbefore it becomes a cost.

Content.title: Simple Forecast
description: Quick insights, zero effort
Upload your data, pick a timeframe, and let our science-backed models auto-generate forecasts.
Perfect for fast trendspotting or preliminary analysis‚Äîwhen speed matters more than ultra-precision.

Content.title: Train Your AI
description: Custom accuracy, no code needed
Tweak parameters, test scenarios, and fine-tune models to your data‚Äîall through intuitive sliders, not Python.
Get forecasts that adapt to your business quirks.

Content.title: Assess Accuracy
description: Transparency you can measure
Compare models side-by-side using MSE, R¬≤, MAE, and 10+ other metrics.
See exactly where your forecast shines (or needs polish)‚Äîno guesswork.

Content.title: Interactive Dashboard
description: Instant insights at your fingertips
Upload your data, set your forecast horizon, and let our research-driven algorithms handle the rest.
Designed for speed and simplicity, this tool delivers quick trend assessments and actionable insights‚Äîperfect when you need fast answers, not lab-grade precision.

Content.title: Metric Visualization
description: See the story behind your data
Dive deep into time-series patterns, seasonal trends, and volatility hotspots.
Our interactive tools transform raw numbers into visual narratives‚Äîexposing hidden drivers of demand, risks, and opportunities.
description2: üìà Compare forecast vs. actuals in real-time

Content.title: Seasonality Analysis
description: Predict cycles, not chaos
Automatically detect recurring patterns‚Äîweekly sales spikes, monthly energy surges, annual inventory drops.
Customize models via intuitive sliders (no coding!) to align forecasts with your unique business rhythms.

Research.title: Research
Research.stub: Scientific publications and developments in time series forecasting

Content.title: LSTM-Based Models for Day-Ahead Electrical Load Forecast: A Novel Feature Selection Method Including Weather Data
description: We present a novel load forecasting algorithm based on LSTM combined with a custom Time2Vec temporal encoding method and weather data integration.
Only calendar-based features (weekday, hour, date) and weather indicators (temperature, humidity, etc.) were used as inputs.
Our comparative analysis shows that the Time2Vec + LSTM approach we developed significantly outperforms more complex architectures like Bi-LSTM or CNN-LSTM.
This confirms that proper feature engineering and advanced time encoding can deliver highly accurate forecasts without the need for architectural complexity.

Content.title: Time2Vec-Augmented LSTM for Enhanced Time Series Forecasting
description: This work focuses on improving long-horizon time series forecasting accuracy by integrating Time2Vec ‚Äî a learnable temporal encoding ‚Äî into three deep learning models: LSTM, BiLSTM, and a CNN-LSTM hybrid.

The models were trained on hourly electricity load data from three Moroccan regions to forecast demand 72 hours ahead. Time2Vec consistently improved performance, reducing error metrics by up to 3.7% (MAPE and WMAPE), compared to the same models using conventional timestamp features.

This enhancement allows neural networks to better capture seasonal, cyclic, and irregular temporal patterns. The approach is lightweight, model-agnostic, and easily transferable to other time series applications ‚Äî from energy systems to transport and finance.

Content.image: /images/images_research/Incorporating Seasonal Features in Data Imputation Methods for Power Demand Time Series.webp
Content.title: Incorporating Seasonal Features in Data Imputation Methods for Power Demand Time Series
description: This work introduces and validates two innovative methods for missing data imputation in power demand time series: H-DIRT (historical regression) and SKNN (seasonal K-nearest neighbors).
Designed for both interpretability and accuracy, these methods incorporate seasonal features (year, season, month, week, day) to improve performance over standard imputation techniques.
H-DIRT uses linear regression based on historical consumption, offering excellent performance and speed for short gaps.
SKNN enriches standard KNN with seasonal data and shows better stability and accuracy for long sequences of missing values.
Tested on multi-year real-world data from an electrical station in Italy, both methods significantly outperform traditional time-domain KNN imputation.
SKNN achieves the best overall accuracy, while H-DIRT is more computationally efficient and competitive when data gaps are short and resources are limited.

Content.image: /images/images_research/Enhancing Short-Term Load Forecasting through Machine Learning Ensemble Models and by Incorporating Weather Data.webp
Content.title: Enhancing Short-Term Load Forecasting through Machine Learning Ensemble Models and by Incorporating Weather Data
description: This work proposes a novel ensemble model combining Random Forest (RF) and Histogram-based Gradient Boosting (HGBR) to improve the accuracy of short-term load forecasting.
Key findings include:
Without ambient temperature: the ensemble model slightly outperforms both RF and HGBR.
With ambient temperature: HGBR becomes the top performer across all metrics.
On anomaly days: the ensemble model with temperature achieves the best overall accuracy and robustness.
These results highlight:
The importance of including ambient temperature as a feature for improved prediction.
The strength of ensemble techniques in handling variability and complex dependencies in load data.

This approach not only improves day-to-day accuracy but also provides reliable forecasts under irregular conditions, making it a promising direction for real-world energy systems and broader time-series forecasting applications.

Sections.title: Introduction
Sections.content: This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how <COMPANY> ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website <COMPANY website URL> ("Website") and any related services. By using the Website, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Policy.

Sections.title: Information We Collect
Sections.content:
We collect several types of information from and about users of our Website, including:

- Personal information (such as name, email address, phone number)
- Usage data (such as IP address, browser type, pages visited)
- Cookies and similar tracking technologies
- Information you provide when contacting us or using our services

Sections.title: How We Use Your Information
Sections.content:
We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

- To provide and maintain our Website
- To notify you about changes to our Website
- To provide customer support
- To gather analysis or valuable information to improve our Website
- To monitor the usage of our Website
- To detect, prevent and address technical issues

Sections.title: Data Storage and Security
Sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. Your data is stored on secure servers and is protected by industry-standard security measures.

Sections.title: Data Retention
Sections.content: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

Sections.title: Your Rights
Sections.content:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

- The right to access your personal data
- The right to rectification of inaccurate data
- The right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
- The right to restrict processing
- The right to data portability
- The right to object to processing
- Rights in relation to automated decision making and profiling

Sections.title: Cookies
Sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Website and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Website.

Sections.title: Third-Party Services
Sections.content: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our Website, provide services on our behalf, perform service-related services, or assist us in analyzing how our Website is used. These third parties have access to your personal information only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

Sections.title: Children's Privacy
Sections.content: Our Website is not intended for use by children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

Sections.title: Changes to This Policy
Sections.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

Sections.title: Contact Us
Sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at <COMPANY contact email>.

Sections.title: Introduction
Sections.content: This Cookie Policy ("Policy") explains how <COMPANY> ("we", "us", or "our") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website <COMPANY website URL> ("Website"). By using our Website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Policy.

Sections.title: What Are Cookies
Sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide useful information to website owners. Cookies can be either session cookies (which are deleted when you close your browser) or persistent cookies (which remain on your device for a set period of time).

Sections.title: Types of Cookies We Use
Sections.content:
We use the following types of cookies on our Website:

- Essential Cookies: Required for the operation of our Website
- Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our Website
- Functionality Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
- Marketing Cookies: Used to track visitors across websites

Sections.title: How We Use Cookies
Sections.content:
We use cookies for various purposes, including:

- Ensuring the Website functions properly
- Analyzing how visitors use our Website
- Remembering your preferences and settings
- Improving your browsing experience
- Personalizing content and advertisements

Sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
Sections.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our Website. These third parties may use cookies to collect information about your online activities across different websites. We do not control these third-party cookies, and their use is governed by the privacy policies of the third parties placing them.

Sections.title: Managing Cookies
Sections.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your device and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit our Website, and some services and functionalities may not work.

Sections.title: Changes to This Policy
Sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Cookie Policy periodically for any changes.

Sections.title: Contact Us
Sections.content: If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at <COMPANY contact email>.
